mapper.select: select a.sid,b.name,b.gender,b.mobile,b.birthday,a.seq,a.status,a.member_id, b.school,b.address from ncs_student a left outer join ncs_member b on a.member_id=b.mid where a.course_id=#{cid} order by b.name
select a.sid,b.name,b.gender,b.mobile,b.birthday,a.seq,a.status,a.member_id, b.school,b.address from ncs_student a left outer join ncs_member b on a.member_id=b.mid where a.sid=#{sid}
mapper.delete: delete from ncs_student where member_id=#{mid} and course_id=#{cid}
mapper.select: select sid from ncs_student where member_id=#{mid} and course_id=#{cid}
